thread.title: Trump says N. Korea summit could still happen

title: Trump says N. Korea summit could still happen
text:
Trump says N. Korea summit could still happen 2:52pm BST - 00:51
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday it was possible a planned summit with North Korea's leader Kim Jong Un could still take place on June 12 as originally planned. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
